name: Mork vs Monzie
description:
This game was inspired by the first appearance of Mork, inside Happy Days "My Favorite Orkan" episode - and starts when Mork (renamed Fork in the game) reach Richie/Rick inside Arnold's, where he ran to ask for the Fonz/Monzie help.

You play as Fork, and your goal is to extract Rick from the building, while his friends try to stop you.  
Use cursor keys to move, SPACE to shoot a freezing ray, and keep CTRL pressed for the control ray - that let you MOVE other characters until someone interrupt your concentration. 
Be aware of your living energy (when you don't have any left, game ends) and of your power level. Using rays reduce the latter and when you reach zero you won't be able to shoot anymore, but it will be restored simply waiting for a while.

Press F2 to toggle fullscreen mode

This little game has been created (using Defold engine) in less than 14 days during TV Game Jam 2019.

Everything has been done by me  (specifically for this jam, within jam limits) with these exceptions:
- fonts (the low res one is from dafont.com )
- soundtrack (a free song by www.bensound.com)
- sounds (public domain sounds, slightly modified by me)
